compliant.section: 若您使用獨立的第三方服務供應商之服務，來備分及儲存您的裝置資料和內容，本公司將收集所需要的特定資訊，以協助將您的資料和內容還原至裝置，例如裝置設定及所要備份之檔案和應用程式的名稱。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.

compliant.section: 本公司亦可能會使用網路信標、Cookie、當地共享物件 (LSO) 及本公司 Cookie 政策 所述的類似方法，記錄您的相關資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have given clear consent to the processing of their personal data for one or more specific purposes.

non_compliant.section: 本公司得使用這些方法將所收集到的任何資訊自動連結至您提供予本公司的資訊，及本公司依本政策收集的任何其他資訊。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.
non_compliant.amend: This section needs to be more specific about the purposes for combining data and ensure it's necessary for the contract or another lawful basis.

non_compliant.section:
針對美國： https://www.macromedia.com/support/documentation/en/flashplayer/help/settings_manager.html#117118

針對歐盟： https://www.youronlinechoices.com
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information provided to data subjects must be concise, transparent, intelligible, easily accessible, and in clear and plain language. Providing separate links for US and EU users may not be sufficiently transparent.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a single, comprehensive cookie policy that clearly explains the use of cookies and similar technologies for all users, regardless of their location. Ensure the policy is easily accessible and understandable.

non_compliant.section: 建立或產生的資訊。 本公司從收集的其他資料推斷新資訊，包括產生關於貴用戶的可能偏好或其他特性的資訊。例如，本公司可能會根據貴用戶的 IP 位址推斷貴用戶所在的城市、州和國家位置。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Inferring information about users, especially sensitive data like location based on IP address, requires explicit consent and a lawful basis. Profiling based on personal data is generally restricted.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the specific purposes for inferring data and obtaining explicit consent for such processing. If location data is processed, ensure appropriate safeguards and legal basis are in place.

non_compliant.section: 使用資料及錯誤回報。 除上述本公司自動蒐集的資訊外，本公司可能會蒐集有關您的設備相關的裝置使用及錯誤回報之去識別化資料 (以前稱為「 HTC 使用經驗」與「告訴 HTC 錯誤報告」)。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Even if data is de-identified, it might still be considered personal data under GDPR if it can be re-identified. The purpose of collecting device usage and error reports must be clearly stated and limited to what is necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify whether de-identified data can be re-identified and for what purpose device usage and error reports are collected. Ensure data minimization principles are applied and processing is limited to what is necessary for the specified purpose.
